inkball

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • inkball.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    The Level class represents a game level. It loads the configuration for each level from a JSON file, including layout, time limit, spawn intervals, ball colours, and score modifiers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Level(processing.core.PApplet app, processing.data.JSONObject config, int levelIndex)
      Constructor for the Level class.

        Parameters:
        app - The PApplet object
        config - The .json file containing the configuration
        levelIndex - The index of the level to load
